title: Artichoke salsa
ingredients: ['180g tinned artichoke hearts, drained and chopped', '3 large plum tomatoes, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped red onion', '4 tablespoons chopped black olives', '1 tablespoon chopped garlic', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh basil', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
